author: Colin M
title: Excellent but very small rooms
text:
I stayed here for three nights and was very pleased with the quality and service, but the rooms are small and so you need to be organised to make the most of the hotel.
The space saving sliding bathroom door was novel along with the automatic lights,overall the facilities in the room were excellent. The coffee machine was a real positive along with the selection of different coffees. Bathroom was spacious, compared to the bedroom and the shower was excellent with good water pressure.
The location was superb and it was a short walk to chops and plenty of attractions, with a fair selection of different eating options around.
Overall I would recommend, although this isn't a cheap hotel.
